title_narrative: Strengthening the Humanitarian Mine Action Response in Sudan
Rafforzare la risposta umanitaria per lo sminamento in Sudan
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: Reduce the threat posed by landmines in affected areas in Sudan, with focus on South and West Kordofan, and Blue Nile states by survey and clearance of areas contaminated by landmines and ERW, socioeconomic and psychological support to victims, capacity building of the National Mine Action Center (NMAC), coordination and monitoring
Ridurre i rischi posti da mine nelle aree contaminate in Sudan, con particolare attenzione sugli Stati di Kordofan Meridionale e Occidentale e il Blue Nile
